S.FORM: == iga-namicakay tuway kami ku Zoo,2011 == 我們買了動物園 , 2011 siwkay ni iga "namicakay tuway kami ku Zoo"(Amilika a kamu:We Bought a Zoo)u 2011 a mihcan katawaay a iga nu Amilika. ci Kamaylung Kelu ku mitelungay. mupalaw ci Mayte Taymeng atu ci Sekaley Ciyahansen. " . u kungku nu iga pazengen tu ku balucu'sananay, 釋懷就是 pizawis tu cacay a tademaw, 接受了一個人 u zuma a sasakawawen malalid i uzip isu katukuh haynisadikud sapuelac nu Amilika: (Amilika a kamu)Moving on is accepting the fact that some people will stay in your life in a way you didn't know was possible. Pan J.M. u wama nu taw, inayi' ku acawana. 班傑明•密是一位單親父親. namapatay ku acawana niza sanay, 在妻子患病過世後 cacay ciniza midiput tu wawama atu wawana niza. sakadahi atu i lipahakay a kakitizaan balaki tu wawa niza , namahiza miliyas kya malalumay a kakitizaan, , Pan J.M. milimad tu luma'niza tayza i niyazu' mapeciay a zoo . u lalumaan niza atu musakakawaway maydih miliyaw patizeng kya zoo, uyzasa, izaw yadah ku kawaw atu sasadakayan, , yamalyilu minanam midiput tu aadupan, 包括學習照料動物, misanga' tu sakapahay a langat, 建造符合規定的柵欄, nipacabay kya mikingcaay, 應付難纏的檢查員, namahiza masasiket tu lalumaay atu cabay, .

== iga-namicakay toway kami ko Zoo,2011 == 我們買了動物園 , 2011 siwkay ni iga "namicakay toway kami ko Zoo"(Amilika a kamo:We Booght a Zoo)o 2011 a mihcan katawaay a iga no Amilika. ci Kamaylong Kelo ko mitelongay. mopalaw ci Mayte Taymeng ato ci Sekaley Ciyahansen. " . o kongko no iga pazengen to ko baloco'sananay, 釋懷就是 pizawis to cacay a tademaw, 接受了一個人 o zoma a sasakawawen malalid i ozip iso katokoh haynisadikod sapoelac no Amilika: (Amilika a kamo)Moving on is accepting the fact that some people will stay in yoor life in a way yoo didn't know was possible. Pan J.M. o wama no taw, inayi' ko acawana. 班傑明•密是一位單親父親. namapatay ko acawana niza sanay, 在妻子患病過世後 cacay ciniza midipot to wawama ato wawana niza. sakadahi ato i lipahakay a kakitizaan balaki to wawa niza , namahiza miliyas kya malalomay a kakitizaan, , Pan J.M. milimad to loma'niza tayza i niyazo' mapeciay a zoo . o lalomaan niza ato mosakakawaway maydih miliyaw patizeng kya zoo, oyzasa, izaw yadah ko kawaw ato sasadakayan, , yamalyilo minanam midipot to aadopan, 包括學習照料動物, misanga' to sakapahay a langat, 建造符合規定的柵欄, nipacabay kya mikingcaay, 應付難纏的檢查員, namahiza masasiket to lalomaay ato cabay, .
